--set.help: Set field value (repeatable). Use two args: FIELD VALUE.

--set-json.help: JSON object of field:value pairs to set.

--unset.help: Unset field (repeatable). Removes all values for the field.

commands.name: company files dump
commands.description: Download all files attached to a company.

commands.name: company get
commands.description: Get a company by id, URL, domain, or name.

--all.help: Fetch all pages for expansions (still capped by --max-results if set).

--field.help: Field id or exact field name (repeatable).

--field-type.help: Include all fields of this type (repeatable).

--list.help: Filter list-entries expansion to a list id or exact list name (implies --expand list-entries).

--list-entry-field.help: Project a list-entry field into its own column (repeatable; implies --expand list-entries).

--list-entry-fields-scope.help: Control which fields appear in list entry tables (human output only).

--max-results.help: Maximum items to fetch per expansion section (applies to --expand).

--show-list-entry-fields.help: Render per-list-entry Fields tables in human output (implies --expand list-entries; requires --max-results <= 3).

commands.whenToUse: Get full details for a company. Selector formats: numeric ID, Affinity URL, 'domain:example.com', or 'name:Company Name'. Use --expand list-entries to see list memberships. For list-entry fields: requires --expand list-entries AND --max-results N (N<=3) with --show-list-entry-fields.

commands.name: company ls

--csv-bom.help: Add UTF-8 BOM for Excel (use with redirection: --csv --csv-bom > file.csv).

--field.help: Field ID or name to include (repeatable).

--field-type.help: Field type to include (repeatable). Values: global, enriched, relationship-intelligence.

--query.help: Fuzzy text search (simple matching). Use --filter for structured queries.

commands.whenToUse: List or search ALL companies in CRM. Use --query for text search (name, domain). NOT for list-specific fields like Status.

commands.name: company merge
commands.description: Merge a duplicate company into a primary company (beta).

commands.name: completion
commands.description: Output shell completion script for bash, zsh, or fish.

commands.name: config check-key
commands.description: Check if an API key is configured.

commands.name: config init
commands.description: Create a new configuration file with template.

commands.name: config path
commands.description: Show the path to the configuration file.

commands.name: config setup-key
commands.description: Securely configure your Affinity API key.

--force.help: Overwrite existing API key without prompting.

--scope.help: Where to store: 'project' (.env) or 'user' (config.toml). Interactive if omitted.

--validate.help: Test the key against the API after storing (default: validate).

commands.name: entry add
commands.description: Add a person or company to a list.

--append.help: Append to multi-value field (repeatable). Adds without replacing.

--set.help: Set field value (repeatable). Replaces existing value(s).

--set-json.help: JSON object of field:value pairs to set.

--unset-value.help: Unset specific value from multi-value field (repeatable).

commands.name: entry get
commands.description: Get a single list entry by ID.

--value-type.help: Field value type (e.g. text, dropdown, person, number).

commands.name: field history
commands.whenToUse: View change history for a specific field. REQUIRES exactly one entity selector: --person-id, --company-id, --opportunity-id, or --list-entry-id. Cannot be called without an entity selector.

commands.name: field ls
commands.whenToUse: See what custom fields exist on a list. Helps understand available filter fields.

commands.name: interaction create
commands.whenToUse: Log a meeting, call, or email. Requires --type and --participants.

commands.name: interaction ls
commands.description: List interactions with automatic date range handling.

--csv-bom.help: Add UTF-8 BOM for Excel compatibility.

--days.help: Fetch last N days. Mutually exclusive with --after.

--type.help: Interaction type(s): call, chat-message, email, meeting, or 'all'. Repeatable.

commands.whenToUse: List interactions for an entity. Requires --type (repeatable, or 'all') and one entity selector (--person-id, --company-id, or --opportunity-id). Date range defaults to all-time; use --days or --after to limit. Auto-chunks ranges > 1 year.

--public.help: Whether the list is public (default: private).

commands.name: list entry add
commands.description: Add a person or company to a list.

--append.help: Append to multi-value field (repeatable). Adds without replacing.

--set.help: Set field value (repeatable). Replaces existing value(s).

--set-json.help: JSON object of field:value pairs to set.

--unset-value.help: Unset specific value from multi-value field (repeatable).

commands.name: list entry get
commands.description: Get a single list entry by ID.

commands.name: list export
commands.description: Export list entries to JSON or CSV.

--csv-bom.help: Add UTF-8 BOM for Excel (use with redirection: --csv --csv-bom > file.csv).

--csv-header.help: Use field names or IDs for CSV headers.

--csv-mode.help: CSV expansion format: flat (one row per association) or nested (JSON arrays).

--dry-run.help: Validate selectors and print export plan.

--expand-all.help: Fetch all associations per entry (no limit).

--expand-field-type.help: Include all fields of this type in expanded entities (repeatable).

--expand-fields.help: Include specific field by name or ID in expanded entities (repeatable).

--expand-max-results.help: Max associations per entry per type.

--expand-on-error.help: How to handle per-entry expansion errors.

--expand-opportunities-list.help: Scope --expand opportunities to a specific list (id or name).

--filter.help: Client-side filter (field op value). Quote multi-word: Status="Intro Meeting".

commands.whenToUse: Get entries from a list. Use --filter for field-based filtering on LIST FIELDS ONLY (Status, Owner, etc.) - NOT internal properties like entityId/entityType/listEntryId. Use 'field ls --list-id' to see filterable fields. IMPORTANT: Multi-word field names AND values MUST be quoted (e.g., --filter '"Team Member"="John Smith"'). To find a specific entity in a list, use 'company get <id> --expand list-entries' instead.

commands.name: list get
commands.description: Get list details, fields, and saved views.
commands.whenToUse: Get list details including type and field count.

commands.name: list ls
commands.description: List all lists in the workspace.
commands.whenToUse: Find list IDs by name. Use before list export or field ls.

commands.name: note create
commands.description: Create a note attached to an entity.
commands.whenToUse: Add a note to an entity. Simpler than interactions for quick notes.

--list.help: List id or exact list name.

--set.help: Set field value (repeatable). Use two args: FIELD VALUE.

--set-json.help: JSON object of field:value pairs to set.

--unset.help: Unset field (repeatable). Removes all values for the field.

commands.name: opportunity files dump
commands.description: Download all files attached to an opportunity.

commands.name: opportunity get
commands.description: Get an opportunity by id or URL.

--details.help: Fetch a fuller payload with associations and list entries.

commands.whenToUse: Get opportunity details. Use --expand people/companies for associations.

commands.name: opportunity ls

--csv-bom.help: Add UTF-8 BOM for Excel (use with redirection: --csv --csv-bom > file.csv).

commands.whenToUse: List opportunities. Note: opportunities exist only within a specific list (pipeline).

commands.name: opportunity update
commands.description: Update an opportunity (replaces association arrays when provided).

--set.help: Set field value (repeatable). Use two args: FIELD VALUE.

--set-json.help: JSON object of field:value pairs to set.

--unset.help: Unset field (repeatable). Removes all values for the field.

commands.name: person files dump
commands.description: Download all files attached to a person.

commands.name: person get
commands.description: Get a person by id, URL, email, or name.

--all.help: Fetch all pages for expansions (still capped by --max-results if set).

--field.help: Field id or exact field name (repeatable).

--field-type.help: Include all fields of this type (repeatable).

--list.help: Filter list-entries expansion to a list id or exact list name (implies --expand list-entries).

--list-entry-field.help: Project a list-entry field into its own column (repeatable; implies --expand list-entries).

--list-entry-fields-scope.help: Control which fields appear in list entry tables (human output only).

--max-results.help: Maximum items to fetch per expansion section (applies to --expand).

--show-list-entry-fields.help: Render per-list-entry Fields tables in human output (implies --expand list-entries; requires --max-results <= 3).

commands.whenToUse: Get full details for a person. Selector formats: numeric ID, Affinity URL, or 'email:user@example.com'. Use --expand list-entries for list memberships.

commands.name: person ls

--csv-bom.help: Add UTF-8 BOM for Excel (use with redirection: --csv --csv-bom > file.csv).

--field.help: Field ID or name to include (repeatable).

--field-type.help: Field type to include (repeatable). Values: global, enriched, relationship-intelligence.

--query.help: Fuzzy text search (simple matching). Use --filter for structured queries.

commands.whenToUse: Search persons by name/email. ALWAYS use --query for text search (simpler, more reliable). Avoid --filter with complex expressions containing quotes.

commands.name: person merge
commands.description: Merge a duplicate person into a primary person (beta).

commands.name: query
commands.description: Execute a structured query against Affinity data.

--csv-bom.help: Add UTF-8 BOM for Excel (use with redirection: --csv --csv-bom > file.csv).

--dry-run-verbose.help: Show detailed plan with API call breakdown.

--max-records.help: Safety limit on total records fetched.

commands.whenToUse: For complex data queries requiring: multi-condition AND/OR filtering, related entity includes (persons with companies), aggregations (count/sum/avg), groupBy analysis, or multi-field sorting. Use individual commands (person get, list export) for simple lookups.

--reminder-days.help: Days before due date to remind.

commands.name: reminder ls

--due-after.help: Filter reminders due after this date (ISO-8601).

--due-before.help: Filter reminders due before this date (ISO-8601).

commands.whenToUse: List reminders. Filter by entity (--person-id, --company-id, --opportunity-id), user (--owner-id, --creator-id), type, status, or due date range (--due-after/--due-before).

--reminder-days.help: Days before due date to remind.

commands.name: resolve-url
commands.description: Resolve an Affinity UI URL to entity type and IDs.

commands.name: session end
commands.description: Clean up the current session cache.

commands.name: session start
commands.description: Create a new session cache directory.

commands.name: task wait
commands.description: Wait for a task to complete.

--timeout.help: Maximum seconds to wait for task completion.

commands.name: version
commands.description: Show version, Python, and platform information.
